title: Ask HN: How to attract perm Snr Engs when the contract market is so lucrative?
author: _0o6v
story_text: As above - what strategies have people got for attracting senior engineers to join a company full-time, when it's pretty much impossible to match day rates pro-rata in the contract market for anyone other than the FAANG's?
